titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2470) to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide protection against catastrophic medical expenses under the Medicare Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-226.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 248 - 174 (Record Vote No: 276).

bill.summary: 7/21/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2470 (Medicare catastrophic care expense coverage).
